document_data.name: Harndarr Oryn
document_data.mainbody: '''Harndarr Oryn''' was the High Mornmaster of the temple of [[Lathander's Light]].
document_data.Description: Harndarr had a short and stocky build such that some believed he might have [[dwarf|dwarven]] blood in his veins. Although he walked with the assistance of a stick, Harndarr was a confident and melodious orator.
document_data.Personality: Possessed of the wits to use his charm judiciously, Harndarr was one who liked to bring hope and a sense of renewal to the people of [[Dagger Falls]].
